title: Onsite Holistic & Integrative Medicine
description: Best Orlando holistic health care option. From acupuncture, tuina, moxibustion and urgent care options.
cleaned_text: the future will give no medicine, but will interest his patients in the care of the human frame, in diet, and in the cause and prevention of disease." - Thomas Edison Welcome to Florida's Premier Holistic & Integrative Medicine Provider. We believe that true health is more than just the "absence of disease" but rather your ability to thrive. We strive to treat the root cause of your ailment, not just the symptoms, in order to truly promote health throughout your body. Our specialties include Acupuncture, Oriental Medicine, Functional/Integrative Medicine, Nutrition and Holistic Mind/Body Wellness. Please feel free to explore our site to learn more about what we do and how we provide safe and effective holistic medical care that is integrative (combining the best of east and west), caring and patient-centered. We offer a variety of service formats for your convenience including in-office appointments, virtual appointments, and house calls (when needed). Better Health Starts with a choice. Contact us today to learn how we can help. We also offer Telehealth CONSULTATIONS for your
